tool_description:
MPS Monitor API is a complete platform for Printer Monitoring and Management; it allows an easy integration of SNMP-collected Printer data in any application.
It includes APIs, tools and Cloud services for building a custom Managed Print Services or Printer Monitoring platform.
It allows support for thousands of printer models of any Brand.
name: MPS Monitor
title: MPS Monitor

api_list.name: /api/Echo/Test
